title: PHPftp_mkdir()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPftp_mkdir()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
Example
content_sections.code:
<?php
// connect and login to FTP server
$ftp_server = "ftp.example.com";
$ftp_conn = ftp_connect($ftp_server) or die("Could not connect to $ftp_server");
$login = ftp_login($ftp_conn, $ftp_username, $ftp_userpass);
$dir = "images";
// try to create directory $dir
if (ftp_mkdir($ftp_conn, $dir))
{
echo "Successfully created $dir";
}
else
{
echo "Error while creating $dir";
}
// close connection
ftp_close($ftp_conn);
?>
